mapper.select: SELECT ATCHMNFL_ID , ATCHMNFL_NM , ATCHMNFL_ORIGIN_FILE_NM , ATCHMNFL_SIZE , ATCHMNFL_PATH , ATCHMNFL_EXTSN_NM , RGSTER_ID , RGST_DT FROM T_CM_ATCHMNFL WHERE ATCHMNFL_ID = #{atchmnflId}
SELECT ATCHMNFL_ID , ATCHMNFL_NM , ATCHMNFL_ORIGIN_FILE_NM , ATCHMNFL_SIZE , ATCHMNFL_PATH , ATCHMNFL_EXTSN_NM , RGSTER_ID , RGST_DT FROM T_CM_ATCHMNFL
